# <a name="strip-ansi-build-statushttpstravis-ciorgchalkstrip-ansi"></a>strip-ansi [![Status de build](https://travis-ci.org/chalk/strip-ansi.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/chalk/strip-ansi)

> Remover [códigos de escape ANSI](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code)


## <a name="install"></a>Instalar

```
$ npm install --save strip-ansi
```


## <a name="usage"></a>Uso

```js
var stripAnsi = require('strip-ansi');

stripAnsi('\u001b[4mcake\u001b[0m');
//=> 'cake'
```


## <a name="related"></a>Relacionados

- [strip-ansi-cli](https://github.com/chalk/strip-ansi-cli) – CLI deste módulo
- [has-ansi](https://github.com/chalk/has-ansi) – Verificar se uma cadeia de caracteres tem códigos de escape ANSI
- [ansi-regex](https://github.com/chalk/ansi-regex) – Expressão regular para códigos de escape ANSI correspondentes
- [chalk](https://github.com/chalk/chalk) – Estilo de cadeia de caracteres de terminal executado corretamente
